inclusion.criterion: All patients (men and women) more than 18 years old who are going to have an ERCP procedure performed at the different centers from September 1, 2004 to about January 31, 2005 will be included.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Active acute pancreatitis (defined as: acute upper abdominal pain and S-amylases x 3 upper normal limit OR upper abdominal pain + radiological findings [CAT-/MR-scan] consistent with acute pancreatitis OR pathoanatomical findings consistent with acute pancreatitis by surgery)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Mitral stenosis sildenafil within 24 hours before the ERCP procedure and 24 hours after the procedure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hypersensibility to the applied glue on the patch
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or a potential to become pregnant, i.e. those who are not using safe contraception (intrauterine device [IUD] or oral contraception)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused. Pulmonary consult recommended an empiric, compassionate sildenafil trial due to severe dyspneic symptomology preventing outpatient living.
